entry.title: BITTEN by Venomous Rattlesnake | Trying to Survive

media:group.media:description:
Thanks to Aviron for sponsoring today's video! They have their best prices of the year on right now and you can get an additional $50 off all of their products when you use code BRAVE50. Visit https://avironactive.yt.link/sLwTVj7
Would You Know What to Do if Bitten by a Rattlesnake?!
Introducing SURVIVAL STATION — a bold new series that tests your instincts and teaches life-saving skills when nature turns against you.
In this video, we drop you into a life-threatening scenario: You're deep in the wilds of Southern California. A rattlesnake strikes — injecting venom into your leg. What do you do next?
Time to see if you’d survive when Survival Station 1 begins!
Chapters: 00:00 - The Survival Situation 01:18 - Survival Station 1: Run? 02:36 - Survival Station 2: Stop the Venom! 07:09 - Survival Station 3: Distress Signal? 08:00 - A man in Arizona got bit 09:58 - What's the Worst Case Scenario?!
media:group.media:title: BITTEN by Venomous Rattlesnake | Trying to Survive

entry.title: I've Taught You Everything. It's Time.

media:group.media:description:
Big thanks to Nomad for sponsoring this episode! Download the app and use our special discount code NOMCOYOTE for 20% off all data plans (available to both new and existing users): https://www.getnomad.app/shop
The swamp is calling — and this time it’s war! Coyote faces off against fellow wildlife expert and YouTuber Ray Tiller for a wild snapping turtle showdown you won’t want to miss. Over two action-packed days, these two hit multiple ponds across Ohio, racing to catch the most snapping turtles, the largest turtle, and the heaviest combined catch.
Watch as they run, leap, and dive into the muddy waters, dodging the powerful jaws of these fierce mud dragons. And the real prize? The custom snapping turtle trophy and the title of 2025 King of the Swamp!
And don’t miss the insane moment when they catch two massive snapping turtles at the same time!
Get ready... It's Turtle Time.
Special thanks to Ray for taking part in this epic competition! Click the links below to see more from Ray on Instagram, TikTok, and his own YouTube channel Fintastic Films:
https://www.youtube.com/@UCRfMWrJRfTSuRswzOYhQ4tw https://www.instagram.com/fintasticfilms/ https://www.tiktok.com/@fintasticfilms https://www.instagram.com/raymond_tiller/ https://www.tiktok.com/@raytiller_official
Huge thanks also to Trophy Tiers for making us this AMAZING custom snapping turtle trophy! They create one-of-a-kind trophies for any occasion, and if you’re into fantasy football, they specialize in stackable trophies where you add a tier every year to display the winners around the sides.
Check them out at https://www.trophytiers.com and follow https://www.instagram.com/TrophyTiers/ on Instagram for more!
And last but certainly not least, thanks so much to our friends Jessica Schneider and Ellie Rial at Holden Forests & Gardens for hosting us on their beautiful grounds! Plan your visit today at one of Coyote's favorite childhood locations: https://holdenfg.org/holden-arboretum/plan-your-visit/

entry.title: Shark Tooth Challenge! Digging for GIANT Megalodon Teeth!

media:group.media:description:
Big thanks to Coupert for sponsoring this episode! Click this link to install Coupert for free and start saving like a pro: https://www.coupert.com/join-coupert?ref=bravewilderness-1742832000&m=youtube #coupert #coupertextension #savingmoney
Just in time for Shark Week, we present... Ultimate Megalodon Tooth Showdown!
Coyote and Mario are on the hunt for prehistoric shark teeth the size of your hand! Teaming up with real fossil experts—and world-record-breaking explorer Lexie Limitless—they’re diving into the mud to see who can score the biggest megalodon treasure.
There are glorious prizes for the winners. And brutal punishments for the losers. And also… The Meg Man himself, Jason Statham?
Dive into the Megalodon Madness with us!
Another huge thanks to our friends with Palmetto Fossils SHRKco for sharing their knowledge and their dig site! To see more of their incredible work and discoveries, follow them below:
Skye & Joshua Basak https://www.youtube.com/@UC-UwRb0cSH8dAYLADzf7uSA https://palmetto-fossil-excursions.com https://www.instagram.com/palmetto_fossil_excursions/ https://www.instagram.com/carolinameghuntress/ https://www.instagram.com/jbsfossildiscoverys/
Wilderness Jeff https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRomDcRcvd3-jjTGSkcviag https://shrkco.com/
And let's not forget out wonderful judges, Dave Ryan and Mark Bunce!
Thanks also to Lexie Limitless for joining us on this expedition and helping to dig up some ancient treasures! Follow Lexie's adventures on her YouTube channel and social media here:
https://www.youtube.com/@UCWoEpiHaC7LOQhaHFT8Rx7A https://www.instagram.com/lexielimitless/ https://www.tiktok.com/@lexie.limitless

media:group.media:description:
Thank you so much to Lectric for making the coolest eBikes on the planet! If you want to ride in style and comfort like us, check out Lectric's XPeak High-Step 2.0 eBike at https://lectricebikes.sjv.io/coyote and get yours today!
This episode is not for the faint of heart.
Coyote has claimed for years that he’s immune to poison ivy—but that’s about to be put to the ultimate test. Joined by wildlife expert, Ray Tiller (who, spoiler alert, breaks out from even a glance at poison ivy), the duo embarks on a wild experiment that pushes their skin—and sanity—to the edge.
They ID the plant and prep for contact. They test leaf vs. stem vs. oil. And then… they BLEND IT into a Poison Ivy SMOOTHIE and rub it directly on their skin
This isn’t just backyard botany. It’s science, pain, and a whole lot of itching waiting to happen. And the results? Let’s just say… you’ll want to see how it plays out in the days and weeks after.
Have YOU ever had a run-in with poison ivy? Head to the comments and tell us your story!
Special thanks to Ray for joining us on this adventure and sharing his knowledge! Click the links below to see more from Ray on Instagram, TikTok, and his own YouTube channel Fintastic Films:
https://www.youtube.com/@UCRfMWrJRfTSuRswzOYhQ4tw https://www.instagram.com/fintasticfilms/ https://www.tiktok.com/@fintasticfilms https://www.instagram.com/raymond_tiller/ https://www.tiktok.com/@raytiller_official

entry.title: Found in a GRIZZLY BEAR Cave!!

media:group.media:description:
Support the channel by getting Fishing Clash on your iOS/Android device for free https://fishingclash.link/BW25 !
Use our gift code BRAVE to get a $20 reward and share your biggest catch in the comments!
Join the Fishing Clash community to stay tuned about the latest news: Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/fishingclash_official/ Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/fishingclashcommunity
Ten years ago, deep in Montana’s remote Tom Miner Basin, Casey Anderson made a choice few would dare: instead of running from a grizzly bear den… he crawled inside.
Now, in one of our boldest episodes yet, Coyote teams up with Casey to return to the most densely grizzly-populated area in the lower 48. Their mission? Find that same bear cave—and uncover whatever secrets the camera may have captured after all this time.
Did the camera survive Montana’s brutal winters? Are there images of grizzlies… or other mysterious creatures? Is the footage still recoverable—or has nature claimed it for good?
As if that challenge wasn’t enough, Coyote and Casey come face-to-face with a mother grizzly and her two cubs—exactly the kind of encounter Casey warns could lead to disaster.
This is more than an animal encounter. It’s a real-life wilderness mystery years in the making.
The adventure is waiting—watch the new episode now on Brave Wilderness. If you to see the big reveal, and more Coyote and Casey adventures, check out Casey's new YouTube channel, Endless Venture.
Endless Venture on Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/endlessvtr/ Casey on Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/grizzlyguy/ Riley on Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/riley.mcclaughry/

entry.title: Searching for CREEPY Tide Pool Creatures at Night!

media:group.media:description:
Take the first step toward adventure with Vessi. Visit https://vessi.com/wilderness to keep your outdoor adventure comfortable and dry. Explore confidently and enjoy 15% off your first pair at checkout!
By day, Costa Rica’s tide pools are teeming with life. But when the sun disappears... a whole new world awakens.
In this episode, Coyote returns to the rocky shores — but this time under the cover of darkness. With his flashlight cutting through the black of night, he’s on the hunt for the strange, the scary, and the seldom-seen.
What creatures only emerge when the world is sleeping? Some are masters of camouflage, others are downright spine-chilling. You won’t believe what turns up in the night.
Special thanks to Tosh, Chuck, and Arturo from 4 Corners for joining us on this expedition! Check out their website and follow their adventures on social media below: 4 Corners Website - https://4cornerscostarica.com/ 4 Corners on Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/4cornerscr/ Tosh on Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/toshtalbot/ Chuck on Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/chuck_hill/ Arturo on Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/marvinarturo_r/

entry.title: STUNG by a Stonefish! (Most Painful Sting on Earth)

media:group.media:description:
See what it’s like to get stung by the world’s most venomous fish, the Stonefish!
In this video I'm back in Australia to show you where stonefish live, how they defend themselves with venomous spines and then I will test the venom on myself to see just how bad this sting is vs the other toxic fish I’ve encountered before. First hand victims have claimed this is the most painful sting on earth. Now it’s time to find out.
Make no mistake, this is a very painful sting and I can’t stress enough that I’m a professional performing a controlled test. DO NOT try to recreate this video. Stonefish stings have the potential to be life threatening to certain individuals.
Big thanks to Miller Wilson for helping our team locate and understand Stonefish behavior in creating this video.

media:group.media:description:
Please SUBSCRIBE NOW! http://bit.ly/BWchannel Watch More - http://bit.ly/BTAgatorbite
On this episode of Breaking Trail, Coyote takes a serious BITE from an American Alligator!
From coast to coast across the United States and all over the world, American Alligators are becoming increasingly popular in the pet trade and while Coyote himself loves Alligators he is always the first one to say that owning them as pets is NEVER a good idea.
To demonstrate why, he has volunteered himself to show the damage that just a two year old juvenile can inflict upon an unwary pet owner…and let’s just say, it’s not pretty!
So don’t let the adorable squeaking hatchings in the fish tank fool you…they will eventually grow up to become large formidable predators not suitable for indoor companions. Due to this reality, it is unfortunately the case that many of these pet Alligators end up abandoned or neglected because their owners can no longer care for them properly…which is a very sad situation for both the pet owners and animals alike.
So if you’re ever in the mood to own a pet gator, do yourself a favor and just watch this video again so you don’t end up like Coyote…and for those of you that just want to see the CHOMP…well, get ready…here it comes!
**NEVER ATTEMPT TO RECREATE WHAT YOU HAVE SEEN IN THIS VIDEO**
Breaking Trail leaves the map behind and follows adventurer and animal expert Coyote Peterson and his crew as they encounter a variety of wildlife in the most amazing environments on the planet!
The Brave Wilderness Channel is your one stop connection to a wild world of adventure and amazing up close animal encounters!
Follow along with adventurer and animal expert Coyote Peterson and his crew as they lead you on three exciting expedition series - Emmy Award Winning Breaking Trail, Dragon Tails and Coyote’s Backyard - featuring everything from Grizzly Bears and Crocodiles to Rattlesnakes and Tarantulas…each episode offers an opportunity to learn something new.
So SUBSCRIBE NOW and join the adventure that brings you closer to the most beloved, bizarre and misunderstood creatures known to man!
GET READY...things are about to get WILD! New Episodes Every Tuesday and Friday at 9AM EST
Subscribe Now! https://www.youtube.com/BraveWilderness
Find more info at: https://www.CoyotePeterson.com
Coyote Peterson on Twitter: https://twitter.com/CoyotePeterson
Coyote Peterson on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CoyotePeterson

media:group.media:title: ALLIGATOR BITE!

media:group.media:description:
If you want to hear the Fireworm sing, check out My Singing Monsters and see what the Rare Fleechwurm can do! Download Today! Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bigbluebubble.singingmonsters.full&hl=en_US&gl=US&pli=1 iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/my-singing-monsters/id521671873
This might just be one of the worst stings ever taken on Brave Wilderness! Watch as Mark Vins catches, examines, and ultimately takes a burn from the dreaded Fireworm. Considered to be one of the most painful stings in the ocean.
The Brave Wilderness Channel is your one-stop connection to a wild world of adventure and up-close animal encounters. SUBSCRIBE NOW and join the crew that brings you closer to the most beloved, bizarre and misunderstood creatures on Earth!
PLEASE DO NOT ATTEMPT TO REENACT OR RECREATE ANY EVENTS OR SCENES FROM OUR VIDEOS. Mark Vins and crew are professionally trained and routinely receive assistance from wildlife experts, guides, and safety personnel when filming to ensure the safety of our crew and all wildlife.
media:group.media:title: BURNED by a Giant Fireworm!
